What number do i dial to pay my bill by phone with at&t?
In: Business › Corporate Info › AT&T
Rate This Answer
If you are a wireless customer you may call 1-800-331-0500 or 611(free call) from your cell to pay your bill. ChaCha for now! Answered

Facebook Tweet Email Advertisement About AT&T
AT&T Inc. is the largest telephone service provider in the United States and the second largest mobile telephone service provider. They are just behind Verizon Wireless in terms of customer base with 92.8 million compared to 93.2 million. The company was originally founded on October 5, 1983.
